import React from 'react'; import {getDateFromTimeStamp, getFullName} from "../../../Common Functions/PersonFunctions"; import {checkPatientDept} from "../Patient/Patient Logic/PatientFunctions"; const InvoiceInfo = ({invoice, setShowInvoices}) => { console.log('invoice bill', invoice) return (

#{invoice.id}

{ setShowInvoices(false) }}> X

{getFullName(invoice.patient.person.personName)}

Date of issue:
{getDateFromTimeStamp(invoice.issuedAt)}
Mobile Number:
{invoice.patient.person.mobileNumber}
Gender:
{invoice.patient.person.gender === true ? "Female" : "Male"}
{ invoices.map(invoice => { increment(invoice.charged, invoice.amountPayed, invoice.dueAmount) return }) }
id Charged Payed Due Amount Treatment
{invoice.id} {invoice.charged} {invoice.amountPayed} {invoice.dueAmount} {getDateFromTimeStamp(invoice.issuedAt)} {invoice.treatment} { setInvoiceProp(invoice) console.log('Invoice prop',invoiceProp) setShowInvoices(!showInvoices) }}>More
Total {charged} {payed} {due}
); }; export default InvoiceInfo;
